      (package private) Vector2 Rectangle.getMinTranslationVector(Rectangle other)
      Assuming that this rectangle and other rectangle overlap, calculate the minimum length vector required to translate this rectangle so that there is no longer any overlap between them.

      Add the values of the coordinates of other vector to the coordinates of this vector.
      int Vector2.compareTo(Vector2 other)
      Required method from Comparable interface; used to sort collections of Vector2 objects by length, particularly for use in determining the minimum (shortest) translation vector for use in resolving collisions with solid objects.
